fullplot: Based on the 1930's pulp fiction and radio drama series, the film pits the hero against his arch enemy, Shiwan Khan, who plans to take over the world by holding a city ransom using an atom bomb. Using his powers of invisibility and "The power to cloud men's minds", the Shadow comes blazing to the city's rescue with explosive results.
plot: In 30's New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.
title: The Shadow

tomatoes.consensus: Bringing a classic pulp character to the big screen, The Shadow features impressive visual effects, but the story ultimately fails to strike a memorable chord.

writers: Walter B. Gibson (character The Shadow from stories)
